article_title: Key headlines as Hamas says 'truce deal' close.
sentence: Elsewhere,  the  Palestinian            news  agency  Wafa  says  at  least  17  people  have  been  killed  in            an  air  strike  on  the  Nuseirat  refugee  camp  in  central  Gaza  overnight  -            Israel  is  yet  to  comment  on  this.
